trans: 偷偷靠近之影

text: Facing a desperate situation, Vaseraga loses himself to his weapon, Grynoth, which gives him abnormal power—just like a number of times before. But Arianensa is able to knock down Vaseraga in his berserk state, leaving Zeta and Ilsa to take it on in his place.
trans: 泽塔很熟悉巴萨拉卡的异变。在众人处于绝境时，巴萨拉卡再次被格罗诺斯的力量所吞噬。然而，即便巴萨拉卡变得无比强大的，也不敌而败。看着被敌人击倒的巴萨拉卡，泽塔和伊尔萨准备与敌背水一战。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
trans: 呜啊啊啊啊啊！！！

text: Vaseraga swings his scythe at the large automaton.
trans: 巴萨拉卡朝着机神挥舞着他巨大的镰刀。

text: It takes attack after attack from Vaseraga, who himself has become like a beast starving for blood.
trans: 敌人发动的无数次攻击都被巴萨拉卡尽数接下，他像嗜血野兽一样时刻瞄准着敌人的要害。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Grynoth's caused his armor to change... Based on the reports, that means Grynoth's gone berserk.
trans: 格罗诺斯改变了他的盔甲。这就是报告里说的格罗诺斯的暴走吧。

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: Yeah. He's pretty much gone when he gets like this!
trans: 是吧。这就是为什么他失去控制了...！

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Tch. Like a dog who's had its toy taken away. I can't be expected to coordinate efficiently like this.
trans: 切！像只丢了玩具的狗。再这样下去，也不指望能好好指挥协调了。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Keep your distance from Armor Chicken while he's clowning around. I'll hold back Grynoth's power with a seal. Aim for that opening.
trans: 在这铁鸡无脑乱撞的时候离他远点。我会用封印之力压制格罗诺斯的力量，再趁机...

text: Ilsa and Zeta devise their plan while assessing the situation from cover. But their little powwow is cut short by a violent impact.
trans: 泽塔和伊尔萨躲在暗处讨论对策，但他们的话语声被强烈的冲击声淹没了。

name: Zeta/伊尔莎
trans: 巴萨拉卡！

name: Zeta/伊尔莎
text: That's impossible! He's no match for it even when all hopped up?
trans: 骗人的吧！这种状态下的巴萨拉卡居然敌不过...

text: Zeta stares in shock as a blast of green flames knocks the Draph to the ground, kicking up a plume of dust.
trans: 泽塔愕然地看着身染翡翠火焰倒在飞尘碎石中的巴萨拉卡。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Humph. Guess Armor Chicken's happy-go-slashy time didn't work out as planned.
trans: 呵。铁鸡的镰刀快乐时光结束了吗。

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: The enemy's probably coming for us next.
trans: 敌人看起来已经瞄准我们了。

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: On the contrary, this is the perfect time for us to take the initiative!
trans: 这就更方便了。迎击！

name: Ilsa/伊尔莎
text: Let's go, Pupper! Gather your wits! I do not want to hear you wetting your pants!
trans: 来吧小崽子，拿出你的觉悟！可别尿裤子了！

name: Zeta/泽塔
trans: 是！
scene_evt171231_cp1_q1_s20
kevin
